AE_package module¶

AE_package.getAutoencoder()¶
AE_package.getLVect(file_name)¶

Take in argument a text file with one vector saved in one line with each value separated by a space Return a numpy array of shape (number of vector/line,number of value in each vector) Ex:

file :

0.1 0.5 0.4/n 0.8 0.2 0.2/n

output vector :

[[0.1,0.5,0.4][0.8,0.2,0.2]]

AE_package.initAutoencoder()¶
AE_package.saveAutoencoder(autoencoder, encoder, decoder)¶
AE_package.saveLVect(file_name, vectors)¶

Take in argument a text file and a list of vectors Save them in a file with one vector per line and each value separated with a space Ex:

input vector :

[[0.1,0.5,0.4][0.8,0.2,0.2]]

file :

0.1 0.5 0.4/n 0.8 0.2 0.2/n

AE_package.save_in(f_name, vectors)¶
AE_package.testShow(dataIn, dataOut)¶
AE_package.trainAE(autoencoder, data, epochs)¶
